ygData.subject: RE: Big update to the tinkering site
ygData.msgSnippet: Yahoooo!  Darn, and here I am at work not being able to Tinker these things. Thanks Luke for posting and also Anonymous  for sharing the information!! You
ygData.messageBody:
Yahoooo! Darn, and here I am at work not being able to Tinker these things.
Thanks Luke for posting and also "Anonymous" for sharing the information!!
You fellas are Gnome Heros for sure! Think I'll get off work early today...

"Kilkin cheers"
"Kilkin cheers"
"Kilkin cheers"

Kilkin Cobblepot - 28th Gemchopper - Fen Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: lukas@... [mailto:lukas@...]
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 11:33 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Big update to the tinkering
site

From: lukas@...


The contents of the Journal of Gimblestan XI has been put up
on the
website, included in it is the plans to make the fireworks
and the
collapsible fishing pole.

I was e-mailed this information last night directly from the
person who
found the book. One point I want to make clear - he is
anonymous and wants
to remain so to avoid getting swarmed by people asking
how/where he got the
book. So if you think you know who he is, don't ask.

BTW Rotgut you can take down the database :) Anyone who was
trying to
figure out the fishing pole formula, you're going to be
kicking yourself
when you see how #%$^ close we were. LOL

-Luke
Tinkering guide website:
http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering
